titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Hydrated Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/14/2006--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2009, the duty on Hydrated Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose.
